DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Hawkmoth proboscis length optima
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: The optima calculated based on selective regimes, pollination interactions, and plant corolla lengths. Original trait and interaction data can be found at: http://dx.doi.org/10.5061/dryad.qn83r
